item.title: New WordPress server
item.description: Setting up a LAMP server Installing Apache Installing MySql Installing PHP Configuring the LAMP server Configuring the MySql database Creating an Apache VirtualHost Installing WordPress Download and unpack WordPress WordPress config file Copying WordPress to its proper location Installing wp-cli This tutorial will walkthrough the process of installing Apache, MySql, and PHP on an Ubuntu 20.
